Class NutUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.wuic.util.NutUtils

  • public final class NutUtils
extends Object

    This class provides utility methods around Nut management.

    0.4.4
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Guillaume DROUET

      • getVersionNumber

        public static Long getVersionNumber(Nut nut)

        Gets the version number from the given nut.

        Parameters:
        nut - the nut
        Returns:
        the version number string representation, 0 if can't retrieve it

      • getVersionNumber

        Computes the version number based on version number retrieved from given nuts.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the computed version number

      • readTransform

        public static String readTransform(ConvertibleNut n)
                            throws IOException

        Reads the result of the transformation process configured on the Nut. If the Nut is compressed, then the result if uncompressed to return a readable string.

        Parameters:
        n - the nut
        Returns:
        the result of transformation
        Throws:
        IOException - if transformation fails
